parseQuantitationReagentCvParam

public static CvParam parseQuantitationReagentCvParam(uk.ac.ebi.pride.jmztab.model.Param quantificationReagent)
Param for the reagent to retrieve the PRIDE Term for that, is important that most of the fields can be null, for that reason we look through all the the information looking for patterns. Todo: Looks for an option to properly the information for quantitation.

Parameters:
quantificationReagent -
Returns:
